Package io.github.neonorbit.dexplore

Interface Dexplore

  • public interface Dexplore
    A dex explorer for finding classes and methods from dex files.

    Use DexFactory to load dex files.

    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • findClass

        @Nullable
default ClassData findClass​(@Nonnull
                            ClassFilter classFilter)
        Find a class using the given filters.

        This is equivalent to calling findClass(), except it doesn't filter any dex files.

        Parameters:
        classFilter - a filter to find the desired dex class
        Returns:
        the first matching class or null if no match is found

      • findClass

        @Nullable
ClassData findClass​(@Nonnull
                    DexFilter dexFilter,
                    @Nonnull
                    ClassFilter classFilter)
        Find a class using the given filters.

        The search operation will stop as soon as it finds a match.

        Parameters:
        dexFilter - a filter to select the desired dex files
        classFilter - a filter to find the desired dex class
        Returns:
        the first matching class or null if no match is found
        See Also:
        findClasses(DexFilter, ClassFilter, int)

      • findClasses

        @Nonnull
java.util.List<ClassData> findClasses​(@Nonnull
                                      DexFilter dexFilter,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      ClassFilter classFilter,
                                      int limit)
        Find all the classes that match the specified filters.

        The search operation will stop once the specified limit is reached.

        Parameters:
        dexFilter - a filter to select the desired dex files
        classFilter - a filter to find the desired dex classes
        limit - the maximum number of results to return or -1 if no limit
        Returns:
        a list of matching classes or an empty list if nothing matches
        See Also:
        findClass(DexFilter, ClassFilter)

      • findMethod

        @Nullable
default MethodData findMethod​(@Nonnull
                              ClassFilter classFilter,
                              @Nonnull
                              MethodFilter methodFilter)
        Find a method using the given filters.

        This is equivalent to calling findMethod(), except it doesn't filter any dex files.

        Parameters:
        classFilter - a filter to select the desired dex classes
        methodFilter - a filter to find the desired dex method
        Returns:
        the first matching method or null if no match is found
        See Also:
        findMethods(DexFilter, ClassFilter, MethodFilter, int)

      • findMethod

        @Nullable
MethodData findMethod​(@Nonnull
                      DexFilter dexFilter,
                      @Nonnull
                      ClassFilter classFilter,
                      @Nonnull
                      MethodFilter methodFilter)
        Find a method using the given filters.

        The search operation will stop as soon as it finds a match.

        Parameters:
        dexFilter - a filter to select the desired dex files
        classFilter - a filter to select the desired dex classes
        methodFilter - a filter to find the desired dex method
        Returns:
        the first matching method or null if no match is found
        See Also:
        findMethods(DexFilter, ClassFilter, MethodFilter, int)

      • findMethods

        @Nonnull
java.util.List<MethodData> findMethods​(@Nonnull
                                       DexFilter dexFilter,
                                       @Nonnull
                                       ClassFilter classFilter,
                                       @Nonnull
                                       MethodFilter methodFilter,
                                       int limit)
        Find all the methods that match the specified filters.

        The search operation will stop once the specified limit is reached.

        Parameters:
        dexFilter - a filter to select the desired dex files
        classFilter - a filter to select the desired dex classes
        methodFilter - a filter to find the desired dex methods
        limit - the maximum number of results to return or -1 if no limit
        Returns:
        a list of matching classes or an empty list if nothing matches
        See Also:
        findMethod(DexFilter, ClassFilter, MethodFilter)

      • onClassResult

        void onClassResult​(@Nonnull
                   DexFilter dexFilter,
                   @Nonnull
                   ClassFilter classFilter,
                   @Nonnull
                   Operator<ClassData> operator)
        Find all the classes that match the specified filters.

        The specified callback operate(item) will be called for each result. Return true when you want to stop.

        Parameters:
        dexFilter - a filter to select the desired dex files
        classFilter - a filter to find the desired dex classes
        operator - a callback for consuming the search results

      • onMethodResult

        void onMethodResult​(@Nonnull
                    DexFilter dexFilter,
                    @Nonnull
                    ClassFilter classFilter,
                    @Nonnull
                    MethodFilter methodFilter,
                    @Nonnull
                    Operator<MethodData> operator)
        Find all the methods that match the specified filters.

        The specified callback operate(item) will be called for each result. Return true when you want to stop.

        Parameters:
        dexFilter - a filter to select the desired dex files
        classFilter - a filter to select the desired dex classes
        methodFilter - a filter to find the desired dex methods
        operator - a callback for consuming the search results

      • onQueryResult

        void onQueryResult​(@Nonnull
                   QueryBatch batch,
                   @Nonnull
                   KOperator<DexItemData> operator)
        Perform a batch of queries. See QueryBatch.

        The specified callback operate(key,item) will be called for each result. Return true when you want to stop further search for a given key. 

        --------------------------------------------------
        Note: Set parallel to speed up the process. In that case, the callback will be called in a separate thread. If you are adding results to a list, make sure it is thread-safe.
        Note: If no result is found for a given key, it will be ignored silently.
        Note: Result item will be in DexItemData form, cast it to an appropriate (ClassData or MethodData) object.
        Parameters:
        batch - a batch of queries
        operator - a callback for consuming the search results
